mapper.insert: insert into pregnancy_journal (baby_seq, user_id, pregnancy_week, record_datetime, title, content) values (#{baby_seq},#{user_id},#{pregnancy_week}, now(),#{title},#{content})
mapper.select: select * from pregnancy_journal where baby_seq=#{baby_seq} and pregnancy_week =#{pregnancy_week} order by record_datetime

select j.journal_seq, j.baby_seq, j.user_id, u.nickname, u.family_code, j.pregnancy_week, j.record_datetime, j.title, j.content from pregnancy_journal j join user u on j.user_id=u.user_id where journal_seq =#{journal_seq} order by record_datetime
mapper.delete: delete from pregnancy_journal where journal_seq =#{journal_seq} and user_id=#{user_id}
